You wanna know how I get the word out about my fights? It ain't pretty, but it gets the job done. Word of mouth is king. You gotta know the right people, the ones who crave the thrill of the bloodsport. We leave coded messages, whispers in the right alleys, flyers tucked in the back pages of certain magazines.

The internet's a double-edged sword. It can be a goldmine for reaching new "enthusiasts," but it's also crawling with those damn animal rights freaks. Gotta be careful. We use encrypted forums, hidden websites, anything to keep the fuzz off our scent. 

The key is discretion, see? We don't advertise openly. It's an exclusive club, for those who understand the beauty of a well-matched fight. The dogs, they're athletes, warriors. It's a test of strength, a primal instinct. And those who appreciate that, they'll find their way to us.
